tasks.task_description: Define project scope, goals, and timelines. Determine technical requirements and select tools and frameworks.
Design a database schema to store user data and notes. Determine the relationships between tables and optimize database performance.
Set up a new Django project and configure the project structure. Install required dependencies and configure the database.
Implement user authentication functionality using Django's built-in auth system. Create models for users and implement registration, login, and logout functionality.
Create a model for notes and implement API endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting notes.
Create a responsive and mobile-friendly front-end using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implement user interface components and connect to the backend API.
Write unit tests and integration tests for the backend and frontend. Conduct manual testing and ensure the application is working as expected.
Deploy the application on a cloud platform such as Heroku or AWS. Configure environment variables and ensure the application is running smoothly.
Create documentation for the application, including API documentation and user guides.
